osx.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build ;clang++ --std c++17 -g -I ${workspaceRoot}/include/ -framework OpenGL -lglfw ${workspaceRoot}/src/cpp/*.cpp ${workspaceRoot}/src/glad.c -o opengl-app

linux.command: rm -rf build; mkdir build; cd build; g++ --std c++17 -g -I ${workspaceRoot}/include/ ${workspaceRoot}/src/cpp/*.cpp -lGL -lGLEW -lglfw -o opengl-app
